Articles.Author: VOA Learning English
Articles.Title: Remembering American Actor James Earl Jones
Articles.Description: Jones was probably most famous around the world for his performance as Darth Vader in the Star Wars movie series. In interviews, Jones said he loved the role and being part of the Star Wars story. “I love it. I love that I was a part of that cult," he said.
Articles.Content:
American actor James Earl Jones died Monday. He was 93 years old.
His agent, Barry McPherson, said Jones died at his home in the Hudson Valley area of New York. The cause of death was not reported.… [+2846 chars]
